name: Ukrainian IT Laboratory
description:
We are a full-service web development company that provides web design, front-end and server-side development services for agencies. 
Ukrainian IT Laboratory was founded in 2015, since that time our experienced team has helped a number of start-ups to build their online presence. That was the key to their success and a prerequisite for our successful and efficient partnership relations. 
UITLab generates robust and cost-effective IT-solutions not only for software development, e-commerce and consulting sectors, but also covers tourism, healthcare, financial and entertainment fields. Our well-equipped software development center is located in Kharkiv, Ukraine. This place brings together the most talented and innovative professionals that develop full-featured and exclusive projects that more than meet clients' requirements.
